channel.title: Begin standing
channel.description: If u begin in the server u begin in lumby.. How can you change that? And where u can see ur players on the server

item.title: Begin standing
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

in player.java search after somethinhg like this

[code]heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 3222;//start in lumby
teleportToY = 3218;

	playerEquipment[playerHat]=1153;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1731;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=1115;[/code]

and change the teleporttox and y

Read full topic
